btv.download.torrent

Class Torrent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • btv.download.torrent.Torrent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Torrent
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class represents a BitTorrent Torrent. This class is used to parse the meta-info file, contact trackers and set up our Peers which will download the Torrent files.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Torrent

        public Torrent(java.lang.String fileName)
        This constructor will set up a new Torrent. When a Torrent is created the meta-info will be parsed, and the directory to store the Torrent will be created. A temporary file used for downloading will also be created.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the meta-info file.

        public Request getNextRequest(Peer p)

      • removePeer

        public void removePeer(Peer p)
        Close a peer connection and remove the peer from our list of connections.
        Parameters:
        p - The peer to remove.

      • infoHash

        public java.lang.String infoHash()
        Returns:
        The SHA1 hash of the info dictionary in the meta-info file.

      • name

        public java.lang.String name()
        Returns:
        The name of this Torrent.

      • peerID

        public java.lang.String peerID()
        Returns:
        The Peer ID of our client.

      • port

        public java.lang.String port()
        Returns:
        The port we are listening for incoming connections on.

      • downloaded

        public java.lang.String downloaded()
        Returns:
        The number of bytes downloaded by this Torrent.

      • percentDownloaded

        public int percentDownloaded()
        Returns:
        The percentage of the download completed by this Torrent.

      • uploaded

        public java.lang.String uploaded()
        Returns:
        The number of bytes uploaded by this Torrent.

      • left

        public int left()
        Returns:
        The number of bytes left to download.

      • getNumberOfPieces

        public int getNumberOfPieces()
        Returns:
        The number of pieces in this Torrent.

      • getPieceLength

        public int getPieceLength()
        Returns:
        The length of a piece in this Torrent.

      • isDownloaded

        public boolean isDownloaded()
        Returns:
        True if this Torrent has finished downloading, false otherwise.

      • numberOfConnections

        public int numberOfConnections()
        Returns:
        The number of peers this Torrent is connected to.

      • isStarted

        public boolean isStarted()
        Returns:
        True if this Torrent is currently downloading, false otherwise.

      • paused

        public boolean paused()
        Returns:
        True if this Torrent is paused, false otherwise.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Pause this Torrent. Pausing a Torrent involves pausing all of it's actively downloading Peers.
        See Also:
        DLManager.pause(String), Peer.pause()

      • resumeDownload

        public void resumeDownload()
        This method is called on a paused Torrent which we wish to resume.

      • addTorrentListener

        public void addTorrentListener(TorrentListener t)
        Add a TorrentListener to this Torrent so information about this Torrent can be relayed to event handling classes.
        Parameters:
        t - The TorrentListener to add.

      • getConnections

        public java.util.ArrayList<Peer> getConnections()
        Returns:
        The list of peers this Torrent is currently connected to.

      • addPeerConnectionListener

        public void addPeerConnectionListener(PeerConnectionListener p)
        Add a PeerConnectionListener to this Torrent. This involves adding this listener to every connected peer as well as adding this listener to peers who connect in the future.
        Parameters:
        p - The PeerConnectionListener to add.
        See Also:
        PeerConnectionListener

      • addPeerCommunicationListener

        public void addPeerCommunicationListener(PeerCommunicationListener p)
        Add a PeerCommunicationListener to this Torrent. This involves adding this listener to the list of currently connected Peers as well as adding this listener to Peers who connect in the future.
        Parameters:
        p - The PeerCommunicationListener to add.
        See Also:
        PeerCommunicationListener
